Thats ok LC.  I had the opportunity tonight to speak with Gab so hopefully between us all we can get her clips cleanned up.
   
  Juli

LC Duplatt <lcdupla@...> wrote:
          Oh, Juli uses it....cool! Sorry I didn't see your post earlier, 
Jules...

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, juli velazquez <ghostchasingfool@...> 
wrote:
>
> Gab:
> I use Adobe as well. Just try the scientific filter, 
then clip and pop reduction and amplify using 3 to 6 boost. Don't do 
too much more otherwise it will hurt your audio clip. In addition, 
always save the original.
> 
> If you want to go through a clip together a few times, 
please feel free to email me under separate cover and I will be more 
than happy to assist you.
> 
> Looking forward to hearing your research!
> 
> Juli
> 
> eastern_paranormal <eparanormal@...> wrote:
> I uploaded my first Ghost Box recording to my EVP file 
today. I used 
> the same process cleaning it up with Audobe Audition I use with my 
> EVP's but it seems to need more. Does anyone have Audobe Audition 
> advice for cleaning up that radio static?
> 
> Gab
> 
> 
>
